org.kepler.authentication

Class AuthenticationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.authentication.AuthenticationManager

  • public class AuthenticationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AuthenticationManager manages all the authentication issue for the user. It helps the user to get the proxy from the GAMA server. For details: http://kepler-project.org/Wiki.jsp?page=KeplerAuthenticationFramework Note: all of the get Proxy methods are synchronized to avoid multiple entries (which may cause multiple user login dialogs appear) from the actors.
    Author:
    Zhijie Guan guan@sdsc.edu

      • getProxy

        public ProxyEntity getProxy(java.lang.String domainName)
                     throws AuthenticationException
        This function retrieves back the user proxy within specified domain, adding ProxyEntity to AuthenticationManager's proxyRepository in the process.
        Parameters:
        domain - Specified domain
        Returns:
        The requested proxy
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException

      • getAuthenticationService

        public static AuthenticationService getAuthenticationService(Domain domain)
                                                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
